- Gift subscriptions are here! -

Treat your loved ones to the gift of extra BackThen storage and no ads!
Some of you were looking to surprise your loved ones this way. Not only were we moved, the request made total sense. A gift subscription unlocks extra storage for photos and videos!
A paid subscription also ensures that no pesky ads will bug your tribe on BackThen.
Just head to the new Gifting section in the menu and choose who you would like to benefit from a VIP subscription.

Have a feature or fix? Write to support@backthen.app and say hi. We'd love to hear from you!

Excited to share a BIG update to our TIMELAPSE feature. We've improved the animation between photos for a smoother experience that now even better emphasises our child's changing face.

In addition, we've added an option to remove any unwanted images from your Timelapse - helping you to ensure it is perfect for sharing with family and friends.

Have a feature or fix? Write to support@backthen.app and say hi! We'd love to hear from you.

Have a feature or fix? Write to support@backthen.app and say hi. We'd love to hear from you!

New Feature: SEARCH

Looking for a specific photo but can't remember the date? No problem. Jump into SEARCH and type what you do remember: Beach, Sunglasses, Hat. We'll return all the photos that meet your criteria. Easy!

We know your privacy really matters - all image processing is done on-device using Apple's clever technology. No other 3rd parties are involved in helping create this magic.

Have a feature or fix? Write to support@backthen.app and say hi. We'd love to hear from you!
